Frequently Asked Questions¶

Questions¶

Q: Message.reject doesn’t work?¶

Answer: RabbitMQ (as of v1.5.5) has not implemented reject yet. There was a brief discussion about it on their mailing list, and the reason why it’s not implemented yet is revealed:

http://lists.rabbitmq.com/pipermail/rabbitmq-discuss/2009-January/003183.html

Q: Message.requeue doesn’t work?¶

Answer: See Message.reject doesn’t work?
